contents:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This is a companion case to Cleland Simpson, Appellant v. Firemen’s Insurance Company, 392 Pa. 67.
Tbe judgment of tbe Court of Common Pleas of Lackawanna County is affirmed on tbe opinion of Judge Hoban, reported in 11 Pa. D. & C. 2d 613.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents in this case for tbe same reasons given in bis dissenting opinion in tbe companion case of Simpson v. Firemen’s Insurance Company, 392 Pa. 67.
